title: Cap-and-Invest: A US Program to Ration Energy and Then Tax the Fations
description: Several US states have implemented or are developing Cap-and-Invest programs, including California, Washington State, and New York State.
content:
This article was originally published by Rhoda Wilson at The Exposé.
